TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PageMediaSize extends System.Object

summary.span: 描述纸张或其他介质的页大小。

span.span: Describes the page size for paper or other media.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括的媒体大小有关的相同信息的类还包括信息和有关页成像区域，请参阅。For a class that includes the same information about the media size as and also includes information about the imageable area of the page, see . > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此类可以缩放以适合它是打印在纸张的边距可视元素。The following example shows how to use this class to scale a visual element to fit within the margins of the paper on which it is to print.
